name: Black Team Bassic
description:
Sizing

All of our tees are of a standard fit, intended to be worn however you wish.

Washing

Screen-printed garments require a cold wash inside out. Never tumble dry your tee and make sure it is also ironed inside out.

Delivery

Standard delivery charge applies as stated upon purchase. Keep updated with regular offers on postage through our discount codes. Estimated delivery times within the UK are 3 working days. Outside of the UK can expect to be slightly longer.
